name: ebnf-railroad-visualizer
description: A web-based EBNF railroad diagram visualizer

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
scripts.minify: pnpm run clear && pnpm i && pnpm run compile && pnpm run minifygen && pnpm run minifywsn && pnpm run minifyscannerparser && pnpm run minifyexternal
scripts.bundle: rm -f ./bundle.zip && pnpm run minify && pnpm run useMinified && zip -r bundle.zip js.min/ css/ images/ index.html README.md LICENSE && pnpm run useNormal
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -R js.min dist/js.min && cp -R css dist/css && cp -R images dist/images && cp index.html dist/
scripts.predeploy: git checkout gh-pages && git merge main
scripts.deploy: pnpm run minify && pnpm run useMinified && pnpm run copy-files && git add dist/ && git commit -m 'Deploy to gh-pages' && git push origin gh-pages
